trans-unit.source: Let's you switch the development system for workflow scenario content.

seg-source.mrk: Let's you switch the development system for workflow scenario content.

target.mrk: 可讓您為工作流程方案內容切換開發系統。

trans-unit.source: When you transport workflow scenario content from the development to the production system, the content in the production system is overridden.

seg-source.mrk: When you transport workflow scenario content from the development to the production system, the content in the production system is overridden.

target.mrk: 當您將工作流程從開發系統傳輸至正式運作系統後，系統將覆寫正式運作系統中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Exporting workflow scenario content is primarily intended as a one-time action to import content from the production into the development system.

seg-source.mrk: Exporting workflow scenario content is primarily intended as a one-time action to import content from the production into the development system.

target.mrk: 匯出工作流程方案內容主要為一次性作業，用來將正式運作系統的內容匯入開發系統。

trans-unit.source: After you have exported workflow scenario content from a production system, you can no longer modify the content in that system because from then on the content development is done in the development system.

seg-source.mrk: After you have exported workflow scenario content from a production system, you can no longer modify the content in that system because from then on the content development is done in the development system.

target.mrk: 自正式運作系統匯出工作流程方案後，由於開發系統中的內容開發已結束，因此您將無法修改系統中的內容。

trans-unit.source: If you export the workflow scenario content for some other reason, you can re-enable the content for modification afterwards.

seg-source.mrk: If you export the workflow scenario content for some other reason, you can re-enable the content for modification afterwards.

target.mrk: 若您因其他原因匯出工作流程方案內容，可在之後修改時重新啟動內容。
請參閱 <xref format="html" href="https://launchpad.support.sap.com/#/notes/2853263" scope="external">SAP 註記 2853263</xref>。
